product_description: Devices capturing video footage for security monitoring, including network cameras, dome cameras, and specialized cameras for various environments.
Cameras and devices that detect heat signatures for observation and temperature measurement in security and industrial applications.
Hardware for recording, storing, and managing video data, including network video recorders, storage servers, and SD cards.
Display units including LCD video walls, security monitors, office monitors, and interactive smart screens for video and data visualization.
Devices and platforms for decoding, controlling, and managing video and security systems, including decoders, keyboards, and integrated control platforms.
Networking equipment and security devices including switches, routers, wireless products, and security gateways for data transmission and network protection.
